name: Old World (itch)
description:
I've never done a GameJam before, and am still learning a lot.

You have seen the sick and dying  around you and want to help them. So you go into the Ghost  World  to collect souls living there to bring them back and use those souls to heal the sick and make them stronger.

Please try the game, I hope you like it. It is not finished, but it's a good start towards the idea of the gamejam. (Also I didn't had enough time to make the closingmechanisum. So when you're done, just press Alt+Tab and close the game.)
